paragraphs.content: When therefore the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,
paragraphs.contentHtml: When therefore the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,

paragraphs.content: They sought more diligently some means that they might put him to death; for many received John as a prophet, but they believed not on Jesus.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They sought more diligently some means that they might put him to death; for many received John as a prophet, but they believed not on Jesus.

paragraphs.content: Now the Lord knew this, though he himself baptized not so many as his disciples;
paragraphs.contentHtml: Now the Lord knew this, though he himself baptized not so many as his disciples;

paragraphs.content: For he suffered them for an example, preferring one another.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he suffered them for an example, preferring one another.

paragraphs.content: For unto such hath God promised his Spirit. And they who worship him, must worship in spirit and in truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For unto such hath God promised his Spirit. And they who worship him, must worship in spirit and in truth.
